attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the credit crisis no one is spending money and people with money are losing interest because of people with debts. Surely if the government paid all debts and take every one with a debt back to zero or make them pay debts with there savings then interest rates will go up and prices will drop, bringing the credit crisis to an end because there be no credit owed to banks. Also don’t give any more lump sums to banks because they WILL just spend it on another party for the staff!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
